moves.1. d4: I'm mattlrkn and this is my first annotated game.
moves.1... d5 2. Bf4 Nf6: A simple but irregular Queens pawn game
moves.3... Bf5 4. Bd3 g6 5. h3 Ne4 6. Bxe4 Bxe: I love getting an outpost on a center square.
moves.7. Nf3 Nc6 8. c3 e6 9. O-O Bd6 10. Bxd6: To me it seems that this type of doubled pawn is not bad. It adds strength to the e5 square.
moves.11. Nbd2 e5 12. Nb3 Qf6 13. Nh2 h5 14. f: Now what do we have here?! The dreaded tripled pawn!
moves.19. f4 dxe3+ 20. Kf3 Be4+ 21. Nxe4: Well, white resigned because of dxe4, 22.Kxe3,Qg3+23.Ke2,Qxg2,
